title: Abhishek Singhvi responds to Daleep Singh’s ‘if China breaches LAC’ remark, says ‘when did USA came running to - Times Now
content:
1. Abhishek Singhvi responds to Daleep Singh’s ‘if China breaches LAC’ remark, says ‘when did USA came running to  Times Now
  2. U.S Warns India Of Consequences Over Avoiding Sanctions On Russia, Coercion Tactic Triggers Outrage  India Today
  3. Daleep Singh discussed goals, mechanisms of US sanctions imposed on Russia during India visit: White House  The Tribune India
  4. India pushes back firmly against US threats on Russia  Economic Times
  5. US deputy NSA Daleep Singh consult sanctions imposed on Russia with Indian counterparts during India visit: White House  ThePrint
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: US Deputy National Security Advisor Daleep Singh said that if China breaches the Line of Actual Control, Russia will not help. He said that Moscow and Beijing are now in a “no limits partnership”. Warning India and other nations planning to buy Russian oil, he said they will face consequences for trying to circumvent the sanctions imposed on Russia.
